DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.prj_agreement_header p left join xbs.employees_v e on p.admin_employee_id=e.hr_employee_id left join xbs.ar_customer_v a on p.ar_customer_id=a.ar_customer_id left join xbs.ar_customer_site a0 on p.ar_customer_site_id=a0.ar_customer_site_id left join xbs.payment_term p0 on p.payment_term_id=p0.payment_term_id left join xbs.currency c on p.doc_currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.currency c0 on p.currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g on p.exchange_rate_type=g.gl_currency_conversion_id
DbDetails.Data: p.agreement_number,p.agreement_type,e.employee_name admin_employee_id,a.customer_name ar_customer_id,a0.customer_site_name ar_customer_site_id,p0.payment_term payment_term_id,p.header_amount,c.title doc_currency,c0.title currency,p.start_date,p.end_date,p.bu_org_id,p.description,p.advanced_required_cb,p.r_hard_limt_cb,p.i_hard_limt_cb,p.created_by,p.creation_date,p.last_update_by,p.last_update_date,p.prj_agreement_header_id,g.currency_conversion_type exchange_rate_type,p.exchange_rate
